name: @atlaskit/pipelines-docker-image
description: Docker image used to set up the Atlaskit repo in pipelines

scripts.push-image: docker push $(yarn -s get-image-name) && docker push $(yarn -s get-image-name latest)
scripts.create-vr-image: docker build -t $(yarn -s get-image-name vr) -f ./visual-regression-image/Dockerfile . && docker push $(yarn -s get-image-name vr)

author: Luke Batchelor
